Title: Wake Up, Ron Burgundy
Actors: Will Ferrell, Christina Applegate, Paul Rudd, Steve Carell
Plot: This "alternate film" companion to Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy (2004) was compiled from dropped sub-plots and alternate takes. While Ron Burgundy's rivalry with Veronica Corningstone continues, a group of unprofessional thieves better known as 'The Alarm Clock' try to make the truth known, whatever that may be.
